button.label: Refer and earn
button.disbled-tooltip: Connect wallet to generate a referral link.
button.enabled-tooltip: Invite people to trade on overtime to earn fees from each trade they make.

unsupported-network.title: Oops! You are on the wrong network!
unsupported-network.description: You have selected the wrong network in your wallet. To continue, please switch to Optimism Mainnet network.

errors.unknown-error-try-again: An unknown error occurred after you submitted. Please try again.
errors.unknown-error-try-again-general: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.insufficient-balance-wallet: Please ensure your wallet has sufficient {{currencyKey}}

market.skew-tooltip: Skew Impact is the amount of premium added to a position price based on current risk the AMM incurs from this specific market.

global.tooltip: Markets resolved more than 7 days ago

table.title: Recent activity
table.no-results: No transactions associated with this market.
table.no-results-for-wallet: ไม่มีธุรกรรมที่เกี่ยวข้องกับกระเป๋าเงินนี้

markets.zero-odds-tooltip: Sports AMM only offers liquidity in the price range of $0.05 to $0.95. Effectively this means that if the odds for a position are less than 5% or more than 95%, that position wont have liquidity.

rewards.description: <0>There is a total of <0>10,000 OP</0> and <0>10,000 THALES</0> rewards to be distributed in 4 weeks, divided in 2-week periods. <0>5,000 OP + 5,000 THALES</0> will be allocated pro-rata based on the total negative PnL (profit and loss) for each 2-week period.</0><0>All markets that have matured in that 2-week period are accounted for. Individual wallet's PnL on each market are added up to get the leaderboard results.</0><1>- First 2-week period is from August 1st until August 14th.</1><1>- Second 2-week period is from August 15th until August 28th.</1><0>This incentivized program will be revisited after the end of the second 2-week period.</0>
rewards.op-rewards-banner-message: OP rewards have started, check how you can earn those on <bold>the OP rewards page</bold>

quiz.title: Sports Trivia
quiz.start-quiz-description:
You have to retweet this tweet and follow Overtime to be eligible.

Connect your wallet and enter your Twitter handle to start the trivia! If you win rewards, we will ask you to confirm your address via a Twitter DM. Discord ID is optional if you want to receive a Discord role as a potential trivia winner.

For any questions please join our Discord.

leaderboard.title: Trivia Leaderboard

quiz.help-us-improve-tooltip: Help us improve sports trivia by adding new questions to the questions database.

finish-messages.rank-info: With {{points}} {{pointsLabel}} you are ranked {{rank}} out of {{totalParticipants}} participants.
finish-messages.not-quilfied-for-rewards: You are missing {{points}} {{pointsLabel}} to get into the TOP {{numberOfRewards}} and qualify for rewards. Try again and improve your score.
finish-messages.quilfied-for-rewards: You are currently in the TOP {{numberOfRewards}} and qualified for rewards. Try again to get a better rank and higher rewards.
finish-messages.quilfied-for-rewards-first: You are currently leading the leaderboard! Try again to get a better score and secure your spot.
